create:
CREATE TABLE tracks (
    id          INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    file_link   STRING,
    file_path   STRING,
    file_hash   STRING  UNIQUE ON CONFLICT IGNORE,
    file_size   INT,
    title       STRING,
    album       STRING,
    artist      STRING,
    date        STRING,
    discnumber  STRING,
    tracknumber STRING,
    genre       STRING,
    duration    INT,
    bitrate     INT,
    data        TEXT,
    counter     INT,
    added       INT
);
CREATE TABLE playlists (
    id          INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name        STRING,
    description TEXT,
    track_count INT,
    genre       STRING,
    created     INT
);
CREATE TABLE playlist_tracks (
    playlist_id INT REFERENCES playlists (id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    track_id    INT REFERENCES tracks (id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    position    INT
);
